channel.title: Novelty Items (Pedo Bear Cape, Stewie Mask)
channel.description:
It just had to be done! For those who dont know about /b/ this makes no sense. Thanks Mitko for the Idea. Your Smily Face owns!
[img]http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/4/1/1847192/baearpeedo.png[/img]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=363899.0;attach=16152]Download Pedo Bear Cape[/url]
Does anyone think Stewie Mask is ok? [img]http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/4/1/1847192/stewstew.png[/img]

item.title: Novelty Items (Pedo Bear Cape, Stewie Mask)
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:5, topic:275471”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=363899.msg2763144#msg2763144 date=1240659637]
It looks…pink
[/quote]
What other color would relate to a bear that stalks 12 year old girls on the internet?
The render actually makes the cape slightly lighter than normal. The Ears in particular are much darker than that.

KoF, I might start making novelty items for RSPS. I’ll start with more *chan memes on capes. Mudkipz is a good one![/quote]

Boxxy

item.title: Novelty Items (Pedo Bear Cape, Stewie Mask)
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:11, topic:275471”]LOL.
Awesome.
Does the mask go all the way around the back aswell?[/quote]

No, he has a strange head shape which is beyond my ability. First I need to sort out that eye (When I create a triange it goes at some strange angle and appears a different color) I will then try to make a basic back and make some hair at the back.

TabbyKiller, Of course its Stewie Griffin!
